todoListApi.resourceUri: Enter the TodoList Web APIs base address, e.g. 'https://localhost:44351/api/todolist'
todoListApi.resourceScope: Enter the API scopes as declared in the app registration 'Expose an Api' blade in the form of 'api://{clientId}/access_as_user'

groups.groupAdmin: Enter the Id of your 'GroupAdmin' group copied from the Azure Portal
groups.groupMember: Enter the Id of your 'GroupMember' group copied from the Azure Portal
